channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Anthropic debuts Claude conversational voice mode on mobile that searches your Google Docs, Drive, Calendar
item.description: With the rollout of voice mode, Anthropic continues to broaden Claude's functionality and accessibility to all users.

item.title: ‘You never know what might happen’: How do I make sure my son-in-law doesn’t get his hands on my daughter’s inheritance?
item.description: “So far, my daughter and her husband have a solid marriage.”

item.title: ‘Is this a good tax strategy or a sham transaction?’ My mother wants to give me her home. I have a plan to avoid taxes.
item.description: “If my mother gives her personal residence to me, my understanding is that I also get her adjusted cost basis.”

item.title: Everyone’s looking to get in on vibe coding — and Google is no different with Stitch, its follow-up to Jules
item.description: Google is looking to compete in vibe coding with Stitch, which designs user interfaces (UIs) with one prompt.

item.title: Akool Live Camera can translate video calls in real time, swap faces, and get live virtual avatars to mimic human movements
item.description: Akool Live Camera uses AI to capture human movement and mimic that movement with a generated virtual avatar in real time.
